title: Comcast
description: Comcast utilizes a vibrant and diverse color palette representing their broad range of services. The colors include FFBA00 (a warm yellow), F56F02 (a bold orange), CB1F47 (a rich red), 645DAC (a deep purple), 0088D2 (a crisp blue), and 00B345 (a vibrant green). These colors are showcased in their brand guidelines available on Behance.
